products.title: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin
products.description: Rich, non-greasy moisturizing cream with 3 essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid. Develops a protective barrier on skin's surface to lock in moisture. MVE technology provides 24-hour hydration.

products.title: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer
products.description: Oil-free face moisturizer with ceramide-3 and niacinamide. Restores the skin barrier in 1 hour. Provides 48-hour hydration. Suitable for sensitive skin.

products.title: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel Moisturizer
products.description: Lightweight water gel formula with hyaluronic acid. Oil-free and non-comedogenic. Quenches skin for smooth, supple, hydrated skin day after day.

products.title: Paula's Choice 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant
products.description: Gentle leave-on exfoliant with salicylic acid unclogs pores and smooths wrinkles. Targets blackheads, enlarged pores, and signs of aging.

products.title: The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% Serum
products.description: High-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula. Reduces the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion while balancing visible sebum activity.

products.title: EltaMD UV Clear Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 Sunscreen
products.description: Oil-free face sunscreen with niacinamide (vitamin B3), hyaluronic acid, and lactic acid. Calms and protects sensitive skin types prone to acne, rosacea, and hyperpigmentation.

products.title: TruSkin Vitamin C Serum for Face
products.description: Advanced anti-aging face serum with vitamin C, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin E. Brightens complexion and helps reduce dark spots and fine lines.

products.title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence
products.description: Lightweight essence formulated with 96% snail secretion filtrate. Repairs and rejuvenates dull, damaged skin for a healthy, glowing complexion.

products.title: Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Mascara
products.description: Lengthening and volumizing mascara with a flex tower brush. Delivers limitless length and full volume for a sky-high lash look.

products.title: Rare Beauty Soft Pinch Liquid Blush
products.description: Weightless, long-lasting liquid blush that blends and builds beautifully for a soft, healthy flush. A little goes a long way with this highly pigmented formula.

products.title: Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Matte Revolution Lipstick
products.description: Award-winning matte lipstick in the iconic Pillow Talk shade. A dreamy nude-pink with a cashmere-soft matte finish that lasts up to 10 hours.

products.title: NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss
products.description: Buttery soft and silky smooth lip gloss that delivers sheer to medium coverage. Non-sticky formula with a sweet vanilla scent.

products.title: e.l.f. Camo CC Cream SPF 30
products.description: Color-correcting cream with SPF 30. Hydrating formula that provides buildable medium coverage while evening skin tone and protecting from UV damage.

products.title: NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer
products.description: Award-winning medium-to-full coverage concealer with a luminous finish. Multi-action formula with botanical blend hydrates and smooths skin.

products.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Wiz Pencil
products.description: Ultra-slim, retractable eyebrow pencil for detailed hair-like strokes. Includes spooley brush for blending. Long-wearing and smudge-proof.

products.title: Urban Decay Naked3 Eyeshadow Palette
products.description: 12 rose-hued neutrals ranging from shimmery pink to deep matte brown. Versatile palette for creating endless eye looks from day to night.

products.title: Olaplex No. 3 Hair Perfector
products.description: At-home bond building hair treatment. Reduces breakage, strengthens hair, and restores healthy appearance. Works on all hair types.

products.title: Moroccanoil Treatment Original
products.description: Argan oil-infused hair treatment that conditions, detangles, and speeds up drying time. Adds natural shine and reduces frizz for silky, smooth hair.

products.title: Dyson Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long
products.description: Re-engineered Dyson Airwrap with enhanced Coanda airflow. Curls, waves, smooths, and dries with no extreme heat damage. Includes multiple attachments.

products.title: Revlon One-Step Volumizer PLUS Hair Dryer & Hot Air Brush
products.description: 2-in-1 hair dryer and volumizer. Delivers gorgeous volume and brilliant shine in a single step. Mixed bristle design detangles and adds volume.

products.title: Chanel Coco Mademoiselle Eau de Parfum
products.description: An irresistibly fresh and elegant oriental fragrance. Composed of fresh orange, jasmine, rose, and patchouli for a sensual, sophisticated scent.

products.title: YSL Black Opium Eau de Parfum
products.description: An addictive gourmand floral with coffee and white flowers. A bold, seductive fragrance perfect for evening wear and special occasions.

products.title: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream
products.description: Fast-absorbing body cream with cupuaçu butter, açaí oil, and coconut oil. Visibly tightens and smooths skin with an addictive salted caramel and pistachio scent.

products.title: La Mer Moisturizing Cream
products.description: The iconic ultra-rich cream with cell-renewing Miracle Broth. Deeply soothes, moisturizes, and energizes skin for a naturally vibrant, healthy-looking complexion.

products.title: SK-II Facial Treatment Essence
products.description: The iconic essence with over 90% Pitera — a bio-ingredient that helps improve skin's natural surface rejuvenation cycle. Transforms skin to crystal clear.

products.title: Tatcha The Dewy Skin Cream
products.description: Rich cream that feeds skin with plumping hydration. Japanese purple rice, botanical extracts, and hyaluronic acid deliver dewy, bouncy, healthy-looking skin.

products.title: Drunk Elephant C-Firma Fresh Day Serum
products.description: Potent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants. Firms, brightens, and improves signs of photoaging for a more even, radiant complexion.

products.title: Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask
products.description: Leave-on lip mask with vitamin C and antioxidants. Gently melts away dead skin and delivers intense moisture overnight for soft, supple lips.

products.title: BEAUTY OF JOSEON Glow Serum with Propolis & Niacinamide
products.description: Korean beauty serum combining propolis extract and niacinamide. Brightens, hydrates, and gives skin a natural glow. Lightweight and fast-absorbing.

products.title: Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser
products.description: Mild, soap-free cleanser for all skin types. Clinically proven to be gentle on sensitive skin. Removes dirt, makeup, and impurities without stripping.

products.title: Supergoop! Unseen Sunscreen SPF 40
products.description: Totally invisible, weightless, scentless sunscreen with a velvety finish. Works as a makeup-gripping primer and protects against UV, blue light, and pollution.

products.title: Bioderma Sensibio H2O Micellar Water
products.description: Original micellar water for sensitive skin. Gently removes makeup and cleanses without rinsing. Respects the skin's natural balance.

products.title: MAC Matte Lipstick in Ruby Woo
products.description: The iconic retro matte lipstick. Vivid, intensely saturated colour with a completely matte finish. Long-wearing and highly pigmented.

products.title: Too Faced Better Than Sex Mascara
products.description: Best-selling volumizing mascara with an hourglass-shaped brush. Delivers intense volume, length, and dramatic curl. Collagen-fueled formula.

products.title: Fenty Beauty Gloss Bomb Universal Lip Luminizer
products.description: Non-sticky, shimmering lip gloss that looks good on everyone. Shea butter formula conditions lips while delivering explosive shine.

products.title: IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream with SPF 50+
products.description: Full-coverage color correcting cream with SPF 50+ physical sunscreen. Developed with plastic surgeons. Anti-aging serum, moisturizer, and foundation in one.

products.title: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day Dry Shampoo
products.description: Award-winning dry shampoo that absorbs oil and sweat, removes odor, and adds body. Patented OFPMA technology keeps hair cleaner, longer.

products.title: Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair! Deep Conditioning Mask
products.description: Award-winning weekly deep conditioning hair mask. Natural oils and B-vitamins strengthen, soften, and restore damaged hair in just 5 minutes.

products.title: Redken All Soft Shampoo
products.description: Moisturizing shampoo for dry, brittle hair. Argan oil formula instantly softens and provides intense conditioning for touchable, silky hair.

products.title: Color Wow Dream Coat Supernatural Spray
products.description: Anti-frizz spray that gives glass-like, mirror-finish hair. Invisible, waterproof shield keeps hair frizz-free for days, even in humidity.

products.title: Kenra Volume Spray 25 Super Hold Finishing Hairspray
products.description: Maximum hold finishing spray that resists humidity for up to 120 hours. Fast-drying, flake-free formula for long-lasting style control.

products.title: Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau de Toilette
products.description: A fresh, feminine floral fragrance with notes of wild strawberry, violet, and jasmine. Whimsical and radiant, perfect for everyday wear.

products.title: Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb Eau de Parfum
products.description: An explosion of flowers — cattleya orchid, centifolia rose, jasmine, and osmanthus flower. Opulent and addictive, a floral explosion of femininity.

products.title: Dior Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Eau de Toilette
products.description: A couture fragrance with peony, rose, and white musk. Fresh, tender, and sparkling — the essence of Dior elegance in a bottle.

products.title: Versace Bright Crystal Eau de Toilette
products.description: A fresh, sensual blend of frozen accord, yuzu, and pomegranate with peony and magnolia. Light, luminous, and absolutely captivating.

products.title: BEAUTYBLENDER Original Makeup Sponge
products.description: The original edgeless makeup sponge. Exclusively designed to seamlessly blend makeup for a flawless, airbrushed finish. Re-usable and washable.

products.title: Real Techniques Everyday Essentials Brush Set
products.description: 5-piece brush set including foundation, blush, setting powder, shadow, and liner brushes. Synthetic bristles for smooth, even application.

products.title: Kitsch Satin Pillowcase for Hair and Skin
products.description: Satin pillowcase that reduces friction on hair and skin. Prevents frizz, breakage, and sleep creases. Standard size with envelope closure.

products.title: PMD Clean Smart Facial Cleansing Device
products.description: Sonic facial cleansing device with SonicGlow technology. Removes 99.5% of dirt, oil, and makeup residue. Gentle enough for daily use on all skin types.

products.title: FOREO LUNA 4 Facial Cleansing & Firming Device
products.description: Smart 2-in-1 facial cleansing and firming device. T-Sonic pulsations deep clean pores and boost absorption of skincare products. 100% waterproof.

products.title: Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops
products.description: Highlighting serum with niacinamide, watermelon, and hyaluronic acid. Gives skin a dewy, glass-skin glow while minimizing pores and dark spots.

products.title: Summer Fridays Jet Lag Mask
products.description: Vitamin and antioxidant-rich cream mask that quenches dehydrated skin. Can be used as a moisturizer, overnight mask, or in-flight treatment.

products.title: Herbivore Botanicals Prism Exfoliating Glow Serum
products.description: Natural AHA + BHA exfoliating serum with fruit acids and willow bark. Gently resurfaces skin for an even-toned, radiant complexion.

products.title: Tom Ford Lost Cherry Eau de Parfum
products.description: A tempting scent of exotic dark cherry, bitter almond, and roasted Turkish rose. Layered with Peru balsam and cedar for a sensual dry down.

products.title: T3 Cura LUXE Hair Dryer
products.description: Professional ionic hair dryer with digitally controlled heat and volume booster switch. Dries hair faster with less damage for a salon-quality blowout at home.
